name: MyReligionHumanism
0:
”Alexa, open religion humanism”
”Alexa, launch religion humanism”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: religion humanism
des:
Skill's Purpose
To spread in the world that Humanism is the base religion. If machine can help to the human without knowing the religion, all human also help to other human without considering their religion. To make this happen we no need to do much but just to make sure that small help to other become big things for them. Once you will do small help you will definitely get internal joy.
 
Skill's feature:
This skill contains motivational sentences and it will refresh anyone's mind. You can use this skill to develop a new breed who will think beyoud any religion.

How it works:
You can use this skill anytime to motivate yourself or others.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
